snippet: Though insurers are assessed $30 million a year to finance Texas’ mostly volunteer fire departments, most of the money is never used for that.
lead_paragraph: Though insurers are assessed $30 million a year to finance Texas’ mostly volunteer fire departments, most of the money is never used for that.

headline.seo: Where Money Collected for Texas Fire Departments Does Not Go
headline.main: Why Not All the Money Collected to Fight Fires Is Actually Used for That
headline.print_headline: Why Not All the Money Collected to Fight Fires Is Actually Used for That
